website_summaries.verdict: While you can get even cheaper Bluetooth models, the SRS-X11 is one of the better-sounding micro wireless speakers and offers 12 hours of battery life.
pros: The Sony SRS-X11 is a very compact, attractively designed Bluetooth speaker that plays pretty loud and sounds pretty decent for its tiny size
It has an integrated speakerphone, can be paired wirelessly with another X11, and offers 12 hours of battery life

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! My husband uses it in his big diesel ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! My husband uses it in his big diesel work van (as the radio doesn't work) to listen to podcasts. It has enough volume to be heard over the engine and the battery lasts all day. The sound quality is perfect, and he loves that it has a little hangy doodad so it doesn't fly all over his dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria L. Silberman

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and value in a small little package.
customer_reviews.text: I've been very impressed by this little speaker. It produces good sound, seems to have great battery life and is very compact. We have packed this speaker across the country to provide us tunes while on vacation and use it often at home with our 3 young kids, who enjoy spontaneous dance parties in whichever room of the house we are in. We often take it to the neighborhood pool which it has held up nicely for, even without being waterproof. The only negative I've found is that if you really pump up the volume the sound does get distorted. But for such a small speaker it does a great job, especially at the price point this comes in at.
customer_reviews.author: Clubs

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are great. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great. Great sound, great volume capability, each unit has three speakers. Not only are they useful for music they work very well with my iPhone as a speaker, easy to carry around as you move about, set them down a talk away, then move and continue. Do get a pair, well worth the small additional cost. Only need one for speaker phone use in case you were wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Quintero

customer_reviews.title: The outsanding Sony SRSX11 Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker...
customer_reviews.text: YES! YES! YES!!! These little cubes are amazing! First charge them up. Took me six hours. Then just Bluetooth them in and pair them. (I bought two for stereo.) And these things actually do run for eight full hours! Never expect that. The sound is full and pleasing. The only problem is that going back to the laptop speakers is now almost unbearable. Fast shipping and best price from this seller. Great purchase.., very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: For its size...awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Sony keeps impressing me. I have a lot of the Sony line up, mainly WiFi speakers. This little unit doesn’t connect to your WiFi, but it can play music via Bluetooth or with 3.5mm aux. with 2 speakers you can pair them for stereo sound. As is, the one solo speaker has impressive sound for its size. No, it doesn’t have deep booming bass...it’s a tiny tiny speaker. But the sound is quite good, and the ease of use plus how portable...total win. Maybe my favorite feature...it can be used plugged in or by it’s built in battery. I’ve seen other similar speakers that only play via battery, aka, no tunes while it’s charging.
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low volume when not FULLY charged
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised no one mentioned in their review that this little speaker loses its ability to have high volume when it isn't fully charged. You can barely hear it from 10 feet away when it kicks into this mode! It's extremely frustrating considering without use, just sitting on the counter without playing anything it loses charge in about 12 hours. Then, you plug the unit in and it doesn't bring the volume back up until it fully charges again, We ordered a second unit thinking it was defective but had the same problem the second time around. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for stereo. They were easy to hookup and sound good, but the bluetooth drops out occasionally. I own lotsa bluetooth devices that don't drop the signal like these do. I can place my cellphone next to them and they still briefly loose the connection. Other than that, I like 'em! Update: I have increased my rating to four stars. I started the return process, but the speakers seem to be working better so I decided to keep them. They still occasionally "skip," but I can live with it. I'd give them five stars if it weren't for that.
customer_reviews.author: grantjl47

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is horrible!! Sound quality isn’t super bad but volume is so low that my iPhone on it’s own is louder!! Don’t waste your money! I bought this because a good friend of mine had one and sounded great. This is sooooooo not the same. I bought the same model but definitely not the same sound quality! So apparently they’ve changed something! If I could give it 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Angelea E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little guy! I can't believe such a little box can put out such good sound. It's easy to set up, and it plays well even when far from its bluetooth connecting device. Different colors seem to sometimes be cheaper. Who cares what color it is?
customer_reviews.author: Marilou Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gift, liked it so much that it was my go-to gift this past Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Originally got it as a gift from my wife. I was amazed at the sound quality and volume this little cube can generate. Solid battery life, I tend to only use it a few hours a week and lasts multiple weeks. Quick and easy to set up. I liked it so much that I got it as a Christmas gift for three different people this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great except for occasional loss of signal.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these that are paired for stereo sound. They work great most of the time, except their signal occasionally cuts out. When this occurs, it usually continues to happen until I power both speakers off and on again. I'm not sure why this happens; they're in proximity of both each other and my phone, which is emitting the Bluetooth signal. Besides the intermittent loss of signal, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this speaker; a past Sony purchase was disappointing. This little guy, however, does not disappoint! I paired it with my smartphone and used an equalizer app so it helps with extra bass if that's what you prefer. And I connected my Sandisk mp3 player to it via the port (sorry, I don't know what it's called!), and it sounded great! You don't have to blast it; if you do you'll get distortion (as with all speakers). I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but probably overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker, especially if paired with another. I don't know if I'd use it for outdoor purposes but if you want a little speaker for your laptop or something, 2 of these would be great for a hotel room or something. 4 stars because it's fairly overpriced but I guess you're really paying for the Sony name. For the full asking price, you could pretty easily find equal or better.
customer_reviews.author: BeerCanChicken

customer_reviews.title: Puts out some awesome sound. And looks stylish with optional colors from ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister wanted a bluetooth speaker. She likes things subdued but still with style. I wanted to get her something that sounded and performed well. Sony brought all that together with this speaker. It's small enough to through in an overnight bag. Puts out some awesome sound. And looks stylish with optional colors from which to choose. If you're looking for a portable, affordable and great performing speaker, Sony brings it all together with the SRSX11.
customer_reviews.author: WillNFLA

customer_reviews.title: Volume is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Volume was so low, I almost had to put it up to my ear! I was hoping I could get louder volume than my Alexa gives me, but this speaker was terrible. I had it turned on the highest it would go. It is going back to Amazon tomorrow. I expected much better from Sony for that price!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn krause

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item so far, have only had it for about 1 week now. I took this to a friend's house with me on Thanksgiving everyone was impressed with the sound quality from such a small speaker. I may revise my rating upon further and longer use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Small and packs a Good Sound Punch
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for what I use it for. I place it on my desk and start listening to podcasts. It gets a nice loud range, the battery life lasts a good while, and it’s a very convenient size. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 was because the sound could be a little crisper for the price. But if you’re looking for something cute, small, and packs a nice punch; this is your cube.
customer_reviews.author: ClearRain

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile by any stretch, but I really like this little speaker. I was skeptical about it at first because of it's small size, but it sounds great to me. I'm 66 and probably miss some frequencies , but for a regular person, I think this is fine., I just ordered another one so I can experience stereo. What I really like is that I don't hear the "popping" sound in the background which I heard with another speaker that I returned last week. For me, the little Sony is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rudmin

customer_reviews.title: A Good Device supplied well on time
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece of equipment from Sony, one of the best Bluetooth speakers on the market with an output exceeding that of most standard models. This is especially useful for the elderly and those with some hearing loss. The quality of reproduction is also very good. The device was supplied in time as promised and well packed and in excellent condition. I had no occasion to write or talk to the supplier. The buying experience was excellent from every angle.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I got the speaker super quick then ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I got the speaker super quick then syncing was super easy! My husband was in the shower and didn’t know I made this purchase and he was completely amazed that kind of quality and sound was coming from that little of a speaker (he’s only 32) as I had to point out it wasn’t from the TV lol
customer_reviews.author: BestLifeWithCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little Bluetooth speaker. NFC for instant connectivity. For the size and the price the sound is very good. Clear, decent low end. A little overwhelmed at high volumes, but for a desktop speaker for work or a relatively quiet environment its perfect! Great build quality and beautiful form factor, but not the most rugged speaker on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Chrietzberg

customer_reviews.title: Works just likeit is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of devices that do simple things, and get them right every time. I HATE "feature" laden gizmos that are complicated to use, need constant updates, spam you with ads, and have lots of "issues'. Thankfully, the SRSX11 is a simple but powerful little speaker that does what it is designed to do: stream audio from a bluetooth device. And it does it well. And that's all I want it to do. That's why it gets five stars
customer_reviews.author: PedalPoint

customer_reviews.title: So I have head this little guy about 7 months ...
customer_reviews.text: So I have head this little guy about 7 months. Flawless performance. It's not as loud as some, but it works. That round oval looking JBL thing I had prior did notlast two months (any of the three). This was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: user name 14072

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases I've made this year. The speaker is cubed shaped and very cute. While I can't say this speaker has the absolute best sound quality (comparing to makers like Bose or Beats), for the price, the sound quality does not bother me at all (I am a musician and am very particular with how I listen to my music!). The volume is also pretty significant, and I love playing music through this little speaker in my room while doing work.
customer_reviews.author: Liliko Uchida

customer_reviews.title: Sony SRSX11 Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Blue)
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed numerous similar sized Bluetooth speakers before buying this one. I am elated that I did. the sound is loud, distortion free, crisp ,clean and reasonable good bass. My friends and colleagues are amazed and impressed to say the least and want one!. It can fill an office or hotel room or even large space with music. High quality construction and feel - not cheap or plastic-like. Will sit well on most surfaces. Fits easily into my briefcase or pocket. Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: Not the "big sound" as promised.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very distorted above 50% of the volume. The only way this speaker doesn't sound distorted is to have the volume cut in half. The overall sound is also not very clear. Very disappointed. The advertisement for this product says "Single speaker w/dual passive radiators for big sound." This is not true. My laptop sounds louder and clearer with no distortion. The reason I bought an external speaker was to have the "big sound" promised by the advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Christine

customer_reviews.title: Why did this fail
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of this item. The first one works beautifully the last one I bought stopped working after several hours of use. It got really hot then stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Da Grump

customer_reviews.title: I first saw this at Best Buy, but I didn't buy it cause it ...
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this at Best Buy, but I didn't buy it cause it was double the price that I paid for this one. The color matches my phone and the sound volume is loud & clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Sony
customer_reviews.text: This was tinier than I realized but surprisingly packs decent sound. That being said, it's good for personal space. Not so loud that you annoy anyone and not so weak that you wouldnt bother powering it on. Bluetooth hasn't had any connectivity issues and battery life has been good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I got one in pink and one in black. Now I can listen to BlackPink in Stereo sound while looking at stereo visuals.
customer_reviews.author: bong95

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Way exceeds expectations! I got two for my hubby so he could link them and they are amazing!! I was a little disappointed when I saw how small they were, but their size has no reflection on their noise. My husband and I are so happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker for $50
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is super convenient and portable to carry around in any occasion. The sound is OK for its form factor, however, you will need two of these little guys if you're trying to host a function with more than 5 guest in a room. I hear its water resistant but, I have yet to test this feature. This unit would be five stars if one could pause/forward music from the speaker it self.
customer_reviews.author: Erich S.C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It's small, loud and easy to take from room to room. We originally purchased two at best buy. My husband took his to work and it was stolen. I guess we should have checked amazon first because they are cheaper on amazon. I purchased a new one for him. I love that they come in different colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to spend a ton of money on a blue tooth speaker. Then this is the one for you. It suits our needs perfectly. Pairs with the same speaker I purchased a few years or so ago at a Black Friday Sale at Best Buy. We've used them in the kitchen while cooking and outside on the patio while grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Ms P

customer_reviews.title: Good clear sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great sound especially for its small size and at a decent price. But what I like most is I have a Chevy Silverado pick up truck and it fits perfectly in the two cut outs in the dash were I can access the buttons easily and it stays in place from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: ATHAND

customer_reviews.title: Great product, minor fixes
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a speaker that has power this is the one. Great sound quality but low on the bass which is reasonable for its size. If you get more than one it's way louder. I currently have 2 and am thinking on getting more. Only reason it got a 4 star is because when you have 2 of them synced together and you turn them off and back on, you have to go through the whole process of syncing them back up again which is quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cahoy

customer_reviews.title: Big sound little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these speakers for Christmas about two years ago. It has lasted through multiple pool parties and camping trips. The sound is quite impressive for the size. Recently I decided to double up on the speakers and ordered a second one. I love them together! They can be synced together or they can act as stereo speakers. The speakers come with a charging cord and a strap, if you're into that kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra George

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but all good speaker. The sbc codec video/audio syncs well with YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Steven Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great speakee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for m son and he loves the sound and battery life
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker. Bought refurbished and just works great. I have two of these, bought new from Best Buy few months ago and Sony quality is so good that I decided to get second speaker factory refurbished. So far not disappointed yet! Follow the instructions to link them carefully, not easy to follow unless you rewrite them in your own words by labeling Speaker 1 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: HVA

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my classroom! They are tiny and really sound decent for their size. The fact that they can pair together really helps for the hearing issues that are typically had when I play audio from the computer alone.
customer_reviews.author: T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Tested it at a Best Buy, sounded great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Coachella as a little campsite boomer. Tested it at a Best Buy, sounded great, so went to amazon. Grabbed it from the warehouse sales deals and absolutely love it! Pretty clear sounding and very good size.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little guy
customer_reviews.text: For the size of this little guy, it puts out some good sound. If you keep it charged, you can listen to your favorite podcast with the speaker not very noticeable at work. Which is why I bought it for my mom. I love their choice of colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Great sound cube
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sound cube so much, I bought this one for my nephew. Great sound. Charge lasts a long time. Easy to pair. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: hippy chick 91

customer_reviews.title: ... have to say that so far I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I just got my speaker today and have to say that so far I am very pleased with it. It is small but has great sound. The volume levels are good at high and low volumes and I like that I can get the volume low enough that this won't be intrusive at work!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little guy can play music clearly and well. Its bass is far weaker than my XB20 but it is noticeably there unless I compare the two side by side. Its portability is awesome and my wife is in love with it. Go, Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Evan_Stryper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from these tiny loudspeakers very loud
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these tiny loudspeakers very loud!and if you buy 2 you can connect them and have stereo surround sound!damn they are good!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great job sony
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, very loud for a little box, meets all my needs. When I go for my nightly walks I use the box instead of ear buds, watch my movies off Amazon prime and use my speaker and listen to my music at work. It's great. I bought my son one for his birthday and he loves it use its all the time
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for listening to my audio books that are downloaded on my kindle while in the car. Plenty loud and stays charged a long time. Been looking for something like this for a long time. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Judith Dedmon

customer_reviews.title: Boom box in a cube!
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise to experience such power in a small speaker! Easily portable with clear sound. Vibrant color. Fun to use! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hamilton-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speaker for a great price. Very easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Decent battery life. I had one before and couldn’t get it to charge, I bought three different cords but couldn’t get it to work do I bought a new speaker. Now BOTH speakers work but I can’t get them to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for size and money. Was about 30 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy V.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: disposable. I bougtht this october 2016 it turned to junk March 2018. I figure I paid a little over $3 per month to use it. I just bought something completely different to replace it. Disappointed it didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tj Trost

customer_reviews.title: absolutely a good product long last battery
customer_reviews.text: absolutely a good product long last battery, good quality, very small and confortable, it would be perfect if you could oair more than 2 speakers and the apiring only works with bluetooth conection if u use a wire forget it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had this device for six months and won't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for six months and won't stay connected. This device was not cheap so I would think it should last longer than six months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nic bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, could do better with some high range frequencies, good lows.
customer_reviews.author: chuktuk44

customer_reviews.title: The sound isnt super amazing, but at this price what can you ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound isnt super amazing, but at this price what can you expect, that said, it sound great for what it is and the NFC is a huge plus for pairing.
customer_reviews.author: V. Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sound like the bigger brother SRS XB3 but it will be ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sound like the bigger brother SRS XB3 but it will be the right size when you want compactness. For its size it sounds great!!!
customer_reviews.author: leadpipefitter

customer_reviews.title: this is a great speaker
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little speaker....I will buy another, best bluetooth speaker for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Cute speaker, nice sound but it Broke very quickly
customer_reviews.text: We've had the speaker for a year and a half but only used it once a week at most. It now barely makes a sound, very tinny and boxed-like. We spent $50 and bought no protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Printer dude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great for their size. Especially when using two in a stereo set-up.
customer_reviews.author: KevinD90521

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth connection and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound from such a small speaker, it stayed connected where ever I walked in the house upstairs or down.
customer_reviews.author: TES

customer_reviews.title: Powerful punch for the size!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is small but sounds impressively big! It doesn't have as much bass as my Taotronics unit which is 3 times the size but for the size, it cannot be beat! I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and handy size
customer_reviews.text: This little stereo is perfect. Simple to use, and it practically fits in your pocket. Sound quality is excellent compared to other mini-speakers. It holds a charge for many hours--I've actually never had it die on me before remembering to charge it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so I could link them for stereo sound with my laptop. It was super simple to link them and connect to the laptop. The sound is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Davy g

customer_reviews.title: Fun speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome! Get two in different colors for stereo and style. Not as much battery life as I expected and a bit cumbersome to get synced in stereo, but they're fantastically loud and clear and even smaller than I originally visualized. I use them with my tablet, phone, and PC.
customer_reviews.author: MoshPitt

customer_reviews.title: ... long it will last but it works and sounds great for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how long it will last but it works and sounds great for such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is amazing for its size
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing for its size, but my speaker gets stuck frequently. Like while it's playing, it takes a seconds pause and then continues. This may not happen continuously, but in the first week, it happened a lot, so much that I could not ignore mentioning it here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This little cube is so easy to use, and the sound is excellent. I needed it so I could hear the sound from my iPad more I needed it so I could hear the sound from my iPad more effectively clearly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product here!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect! The size, the sound, the color! My hairdresser uses the white one in her salon for Pandora and I loved the amount of sound that comes from it. I hook up my phone and hear my books on tape! Awesome, you need one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Good volume for such a small speaker. Very portable. I'm glad I went with Sony instead of cheaper options out there. The quality is just superior.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and built.
customer_reviews.text: Compact in size, good assembly quality. Sound quality and volume is good for small room with low ambience noise, inadequate for large room or noisy party. Sound quality suffers when volume is cranked up.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality speaker for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality speaker for such a low price. We actually gave out several of these as prizes and everyone still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: IslandGyalTiredofBeingRippedOff

customer_reviews.title: Little Speaker, Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy!!!!! Great noise for how small it is. Brought it on a float trip last weekend and it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker is awesome! Great
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is awesome! Great, full sound you'd expect from a much larger- and more expensive- unit. Easy to set up, good battery life. And you can pair two of them to create big stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in small packag
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect. Mono sound, but can be stereo if you have 2 of these. Perfect clarity even on max volume. Loud sound far surpass its mini size. Can use both AUX cable or bluetooth. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hakimhakim

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it does not have deep thumping bass, but it does produce a nice "full" sound. Got it for the wife and we are both very surprised. Looks and feels like quality. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smalll but great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the deal. Nice and smalll but great sound. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Turkey 2

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume
customer_reviews.text: Not enough volume. Even at it's highest, if you stepped a few feet away, you couldn't hear it. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: E. I. HILL

customer_reviews.title: SRSX11 Sony bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase of this speaker. Great sound for such a small speaker. Would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bastings

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker is so cool. It was a used product
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is so cool. It was a used product, but in great shape when it arrived. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: For its size, the sound quality is incredible. ...
customer_reviews.text: For its size, the sound quality is incredible. One charge seems to keep it going for ever! It's heavier than you think, but certainly works very well for podcasts and music. I'm going to buy some more for friends!
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: This little cube is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This little cube is awesome!!! Great sound! And we can just pick it up and carry outside when we want. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I first was introduced to the Sony Cube at game night. This sound cube is very easy to use. I'm even thinking of purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding Bluetooth speaker love that I could pair two together for true stereo sound
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two speakers and once they were paired have incredible sound for their size. Wireless works well.
customer_reviews.author: J. McIlvaine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even the inexpensive cost
customer_reviews.text: Not very good sound quality, even for one this inexpensive. I wish I had the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little speaker. Sony pairing app works flawlessly. Great tone, Good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Rahim

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Sound
customer_reviews.text: My son swears this is very good for sound output. It wasn’t bad, but my Bose dock is much louder. It is a larger unit though, so this Sony cube thingy still receives 5 stars in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: LaMarna Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Little Box packs a big punch!
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. Syncs easily with iPhones and has great sound! Purchased it to use for cheer halftime routines!
customer_reviews.author: Shari A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my older mom. She uses it with a Kindle Fire tablet.
customer_reviews.author: wsfarris

customer_reviews.title: I also like the fact that it pairs with other cubes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This little cube packs a punch, I always get compliments at parties and events when I bust it out and play music. I also like the fact that it pairs with other cubes and it also has NFC pairing. Would recommend if you're looking for a small speaker to bring around to outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Deej E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Already have one, added 2nd for the surround sound. great sound.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No need to throw away your old speakers that had the old apple connector. I use this for my bose and Sony docks and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mudds

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more treble -- it sounds "muddy"
customer_reviews.text: The sound of this lacks treble and sounds muddy. Not good for music in my opinion. I like the form factor and will keep it for podcasts and as a speakerphone for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: This speaker makes such a great sound and takes up such little space
customer_reviews.text: This speaker makes such a great sound and takes up such little space. It was in new condition when I received it, although, since I am a bit active with it, I've already chipped it a bit. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied with the Product. Received the item very quick..
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Tiny yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bang for your buck! Small but puts out really good sound and it's really portable for all kinds of trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dacia Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS OUT OF FIVE
customer_reviews.text: VOLUME WAS GOOD. I HAVE NOT USED IT ENOUGH TO WEAR THE CHARGE DOWN TO 0 YET WITH ABOUT 1.5 HOURS.
customer_reviews.author: Lamont

product_meta.title: Sony SRSX11 Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIntroducing featherweight sound with heavyweight punch that’s always ready for the moment. Easily connect compatible Bluetooth devices using NFC and wirelessly stream rich sound or hands-free calls with up to 12 hours of battery life. Easily double your audio enjoyment with enhanced stereo sound, simply by pairing a second unit.
feature_bullets: Size-defying sound with 10 Watts of digital amplification, Single speaker w/dual passive radiators for big sound, Speaker Add function (Stereo or Double Modes), Bluetooth audio streaming with SBC support
Convenient One-touch listening technology, Enjoy up to 12 hours of battery life with a single charge, Easily take calls using the speakerphone functionality
Convenient speaker charging via micro USB input, Supplied Silicon Accessory Strap, Available in 5 fun and exciting colors
